How It Works

Record Messages
Safe Storage
Delivery In Future

  • You designate 2 trustees to signal your own life-changing event.

  • You leave group and individual messages, text, email, audio or video messages.

  • When you designate dispatch, your approve the delivery, or your trustees do, and we take care of the rest. Your friends, family, loved ones, and professional contacts will receive a packaged message just as you felt and created it the day it was recorded or sent to us.

Preserve your emotions when it bubbles up

Every memory, every emotion, able to be preserved when it bubbles up in your heart and mind, and shared, or delivered at some point in the future, either a specific date for a special birthday or anniversary, or as insurance that youâ€™ve left these words to be considered at some point after your passing, 1 year, 1 day, or 5 years. We maintain contact with your contacts, keeping their information current to ensure as much as they will allow that your words will be delivered unimpeded and intact.

Your last messages are not an official will, and there is no lawyer, or 3rd party changing the feel of your words or intents.
